allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - CropClient MCP services alpha

API server, MCP server, pages, tools, and support files.
First real push to GitHub filing cabinet.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - CropClient Claude Desktop workspace

Butler app, MCP API tools audit, mockups, and design docs.
Backup to GitHub filing cabinet.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" auth login --web -p https)
Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" repo create CropClient-Claude-Desktop --public --description "Butler app, MCP API tools audit, design docs")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update SERVER-INSTALL-GUIDE with real repo URLs and accurate steps

Added pre-requisites, SSL, PM2, troubleshooting, future updates.
Linked steps to token/agent processes.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
